text:
((18+ only))

Ok I'm looking for something fucked up involving a sextuplet of your choice (played by you) getting publically used by a bunch of men who degrade and abuse him. I'm just looking for sexual stuff so plot or background isn't really necessary. I just want to see a Matsu forced into bondage and fucked constantly from both holes.

Kinks are public use, heavy bondage, struggling, humiliation, cum dump, kidnapping, deepthroating, slave training, gags, blindfolds, latex, sex toys, nipple clamps, prostitution, fucking machines, overstimulation, and probably more! Hard no's are blood, unsanitary stuff, vomit, mpreg, and death.

I await your connection!
Howdy!
(( hi!
I love what you have listed here
(( glad you like my kinks! got any others you'd like to add?
Long shot, but I’m absolutely in love with mummification.
(( same here! there's something satisfying about seeing them wrapped up and helpless
Definitely!
(( so who would you want to play?
I was thinking of either Ichi or Jyushi
(( Ichi would be nice!

Ichi it is then! 

Maybe he’s walking through a new park in town and gets chosen to be a new feature? Collared and kept in heavy restraints, chained to a pole and he can be rented out to anyone for whatever they want?

Ichi it is then! 

Maybe he’s walking through a new park in town and gets chosen to be a new feature? Collared and kept in heavy restraints, chained to a pole and he can be rented out to anyone for whatever they want?
(( I love that idea! each master/mistress would be cruel in their own ways, always looking for fun ways to humiliate ichi

Of course! It’d be in a civic center type building in its own room with anything someone might need to have fun with the park’s new toy but people are free to bring things from home or even rent him out for parties if they want to take him home
(( nice! Ichi is treated like a toy, maybe has to eat and drink out of a bowl like an animal
Maybe drugged to keep him docile and always ready to be toyed with
(( good idea! can't forget aphrodisiacs to make him restless and horny if necessary
Definitely a plus!
(( anything else to discuss before starting?
I don’t think so
(( alright! I'll write the starter once I've gotten some more sleep
That’s totally fair

The newest park just outside Akatsuka Ward was a nice little area, with seemingly kind people running it. With the park being as small as it was, not many people had a reason to visit, leaving those running the park wondering what they should do to attract more visitors.

When the idea to appeal to people's sexuality was brought up, a plan was put into motion to kidnap a visitor and keep them as a pet. Investments were made towards sex toys and restraints, along with one of the building's rooms being transformed into a place to house the new pet.

And once they found their new feature, they acted accordingly, throwing a sack over his head and bringing him to the building where he would be kept.

Entering the special room, one locked the door before the one carrying the bag emptied him on the floor, pinning him down as one approached his face with a huge ball gag.

"Open up, little pet, and we'll explain everything more clearly."

Ichimatsu wasn’t particularly entranced with being surrounded by large groups of people at any given time. The house was full with his brothers for the most part, so getting away from all the commotion by taking a walk was part of his daily routine. It worked out in his favor that the park was small and didn’t get many visitors. 

He definitely never imagined that he would get attacked in the park, shoved into a burlap sack that quickly begins to overheat and envelops him in total darkness. And once he’s unceremoniously dumped onto the floor and pinned down, Ichi tries to take in his surroundings and piece together what’s happening.

“Explain what?” He asks incredulously. “What’s going on?”
